textBeforeTable: 1) Please take a few moments to think back over the last week. In that period of seven daysand that period onlyhow often did you read the Bible or hear the Bible read (excluding during worship services) on your own? (Q1OWN) All frequencies are raw numbers (no weights used). textAfterTable: [ Analyze results | Add to Question Bank | View Question Bank ] 2) Please take a few moments to think back over the last week. In that period of seven daysand that period onlyhow often did you read the Bible or hear the Bible read (excluding during worship services) with family? (Q1FAMILY) TOTAL % 1) Never 392 72.5 2) Once or twice 93 17.2 3) A few times 30 5.5 4) Often, but not daily 19 3.5 5) At least daily 7 1.3 Missing 44   TOTAL 541 100.0 [ Analyze results | Add to Question Bank | View Question Bank ] 3) Please take a few moments to think back over the last week. In that period of seven daysand that period onlyhow often did you read the Bible or hear the Bible read (excluding during worship services) in connection with a group devoted specifically to Bible study? (Q1BSTUDY) TOTAL % 1) Never 384 68.8 2) Once or twice 118 21.1 3) A few times 23 4.1 4) Often, but not daily 28 5.0
